titleInfo.title: University of Tennessee Social Science Projects

subject.topic: United States. Federal Civil Works Administration.

subject.geographic: The Great Depression and World War II (1929-1945).

mods.note: Description of Social Science research projects being carried on at the University of Tennessee relating to the historical, social, and economic development of the Tennessee Valley and its present condition. These projects are being funded by the Federal Civil Works Administration.
The University of Tennessee Libraries (Knoxville, Tennessee) is the digital publisher.

titleInfo.title: Digital Collection: The Growth of Democracy in Tennessee: A Grassroots Approach to Volunteer Voices
